name: dev-lab-quebec-game
description: ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ### From scratch, create a web-based MVC Single Page Application (SPA) ### Required technology stack: Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, RestfulAPI  ### Source code and environments: local and remote with git & GitHub, proper security and access configurations, use of .gitignore ### Development features to include: nodemon, RESTful API, dotenv (for secrets/credentials) ### Functionality: demonstrate CRUD operations (POST, GET, PUT, DELETE), full stack round trip with persistent data ### Deployment: Render or another PaaS ### App standards: self-describing, authorship attributed, use of front-end frameworks (normalize.css, Bootstrap 5, jQuery/UI)
